32#ifndef __LIB_DM_H__
33#define __LIB_DM_H__
34
35#include <prop/proplib.h>
36#include <dm.h>
37
38# define MAJOR(x) major((x))
39# define MINOR(x) minor((x))
40# define MKDEV(x,y) makedev((x),(y))
41
42/* Name of device-mapper driver in kernel */
43#define DM_NAME "dm"
44
45/* Types for nbsd_get_dm_major */
46#define DM_CHAR_MAJOR 1
47#define DM_BLOCK_MAJOR 2
48
49/* libdm_netbsd.c */
50int nbsd_get_dm_major(uint32_t *, int); /* Get dm device major numbers */
51
52int nbsd_dmi_add_cmd(const char *, libdm_task_t);
53int nbsd_dmi_add_version(const int [3], libdm_task_t);
54
55struct dm_ioctl* nbsd_dm_dict_to_dmi(libdm_task_t, const int);
56
57#endif /* __NETBSD_DM_H__ */
58
